sum_bart: This is a confirmation certificate issued by the Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI) for the quarter ended 31 March, 2025. The certificate was issued by KFin Technologies Limited, the Registrar and Share Transfer Agent of our Company.
sum_peg: Pursuant to Regulation 74(5) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018, please find enclosed herewith Certificate issued by KFin Technologies Limited and Share Transfer Agent (RTA) for the quarter ended 31 st March, 2025 .
